description.title: Error: group txs in a batch with one causing a revert
description.purpose: The idea of the test is to have four transactions waiting to be processed pre-loaded into the mempool, where one of them will be reverted. This is done by feeding in the txs with decreasing nonces, so that when the lowest nonce is finally sent, all the txs should then get processed. We want to make sure all txs are mined correctly with no issue in the network.
